<MembersIndexItem
  type="class"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/passregistry">PassRegistry</a></>}>
<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/passregistry">PassRegistry</a> - This class manages the registration and intitialization of the pass subsystem as application startup, and assists the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/passmanager">PassManager</a> in resolving pass dependencies. <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/passregistry/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

</MembersIndex>
